thread.title: Jesse James Says the Hardest Part About the Sandra Bullock Split Was Losing Son Louis
thread.title_full: Jesse James Says the Hardest Part About the Sandra Bullock Split Was Losing Son Louis - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Jesse James Says the Hardest Part About the Sandra Bullock Split Was Losing Son Louis
text: Jesse James is still blaming ex-wife Sandra Bullock for the way their breakup, which was caused by the fact that he got caught and exposed as a serial cheater, played out in the media. In a new interview, the TV personality praises himself for the way he owned up to his mistakes and laments the “unfair” treatment he got in the media and at home. As for the “hardest” part about the split, he says that is, without a doubt, losing his “son” Louis, the baby boy he and Sandra ha... »
